Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2009 09:12PM lizardbreath wrote: Thank you for replying back.  Good for all of you for being so darn admirable.  Every single woman on here is a hero.  I swear. And I wanted to add that I hope my first post did not sound too... optimistic or chirpy or whatever.  I hope not.  I just wanted to post to say "it went ok." Thank you, all, and I'll keep reading.  P.S.  Jax and gp, good to hear that you made it with the veins.  YAY. You'll be my models (and my mom, who is now into T and herceptin with no port, knock wood and thank God). P.S.S.  Keep up the good work bellydancer.
Posts.Title: No Port, First Chemo, On With The Show! lizardbreath LRM216
